content:
I’ve got a problem while uploading LONC latest terminolgy with hapi-cli tool. java.lang.IllegalArgumentException exception raised by:

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: theValue must not be null or empty
 at ca.uhn.fhir.util.ValidateUtil.isNotBlankOrThrowIllegalArgument(ValidateUtil.java:50)
 at ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.entity.TermConceptDesignation.setValue(TermConceptDesignation.java:115)
 at ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.term.loinc.LoincHandler.accept(LoincHandler.java:71)
 at ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.term.TerminologyLoaderSvcImpl.iterateOverZipFile(TerminologyLoaderSvcImpl.java:171)
 at ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.term.TerminologyLoaderSvcImpl.processLoincFiles(TerminologyLoaderSvcImpl.java:424)
 at ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.term.TerminologyLoaderSvcImpl.loadLoinc(TerminologyLoaderSvcImpl.java:240)
 at ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.provider.BaseTerminologyUploaderProvider.handleUploadExternalCodeSystem(BaseTerminologyUploaderProvider.java:123)
 at ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.provider.r4.TerminologyUploaderProviderR4.uploadExternalCodeSystem

does anyone know how to solve it? :slight_smile:
I’ve posted GitHub issue here: https://github.com/jamesagnew/hapi-fhir/issues/1394

thanks
@Diederik Muylwyk is actively working on the LOINC integration module right now, this may be an unintended regression. I'll ping him.
@James Agnew thank you very much
